ai-anya-e0702n8:0_0: Discussion of the proper conduct for majesty of horses,
ai-anya-e0702n8:1_1: Now, as the Master Visākha restraint was stated in the way already described. Consequently the Discipline enlightened, having reached the state of an abode of the journey.
ai-anya-e0702n8:2_0: The third Great Sage went to the Great Chapter of the Disciple, the Elder Mahiṁsāsaka and Vaṅgīsa, the Lord of Men, went to the Faith. In the pavilion (of the Faith), he established the Doctrine of the Faith.
ai-anya-e0702n8:3_0: When he had acquired five valuable names, he went to the districts of the borderlands, going to the countryside, thinking: “Having been able to receive the full ordination in the country.”
ai-anya-e0702n8:3_1: The Elder Mahādeva, having gone to the pavilion in the pavilion of the Divinities,
ai-anya-e0702n8:3_2: Forty thousand (people) purified the Dhamma-Eye, the Visionary One preached the Dhamma.
ai-anya-e0702n8:4_0: Having gone to the country of great power, the great sage,
ai-anya-e0702n8:5_0: Having accused Devadatta, his released many people from the fetters.
ai-anya-e0702n8:6_0: but, with no hate in the opening of the Dispensation, the opportunity to be found.
ai-anya-e0702n8:7_0: the Great Council of the Dispensation has the intention of the World.
